T04sanss11u:1: tad evam ugradattaparipṛcchāvidhinā gṛhadoṣān bhāvayitvā śrutavatā cittaṃ śodhayitum araṇyam āśrayaṇīyam iti sthitaṃ ||
T04sanss11u:3: na jātu kāmān pratiṣevamāṇaḥ putreṣu dāreṣu janitva tṛṣṇāṃ |
T04sanss11u:4: gṛhaṃ ca sevitva jugupsanīyam anuttarāṃ prāpsyati so 'grabodhim ||
T04sanss11u:5: ye kāma varjenti yathâgnikarṣūṃ putreṣu dāreṣu janitva tṛṣṇāṃ |
T04sanss11u:6: uttasta gehād abhiniṣkramanti na durlabhā teṣv iyam agrabodhiḥ ||
T04sanss11u:7: na kaści buddhaḥ purimeṇâsīd anāgato bheṣyati yo 'vatiṣṭhate |
T04sanss11u:11: jyaṃ yatha kheṭapiṇḍaṃ vased araṇyeṣu vivekakāmaḥ |
T04sanss11u:12: kleśān prahāya vinihatya mānaṃ budhyanti bodhiṃ virajām asaṃskṛtām ||
T04sanss11u:14: annehi pānehi ca cīvarehi puṣpehi gandhehi vilepanehi |
T04sanss11u:15: nôpasthitā bhonti narôttamā jinā yatha pravrajitvā caramāṇadharmān ||
T04sanss11u:16: yaś câiva bodhiṃ pratikāṅkṣamāṇaḥ satvârtha nirviṇṇa kusaṃskṛtātaḥ |
T04sanss11u:17: araṇyâbhimukha sapta padāni gacched ayaṃ tataḥ puṇyaviśiṣṭa bhoti ||
T04sanss11u:18: yadi punar visabhāgasatvânunayāt pariṣatkāmatayā vā lābhâdikāmatayā vā vivekapraveśe vilambeta
T04sanss11u:21: na vijña bālehi karonti vigrahaṃ satkṛtya bālān parivarjayanti |
T04sanss11u:22: mamântike cêti praduṣṭacittā na bāladharmehi karonti saṃstavam ||
T04sanss11u:23: na vijña bālāna karoti sevanāṃ viditva bālāna svabhāvasaṃtatim |
T04sanss11u:24: kiyacciraṃ bālasusevitā pi puno 'pi te bhonti amitrasannibhāḥ ||
T04sanss11u:25: na vijña bāleṣv iha viśvasanti vijñāya bālāna svabhāvasaṃtatim |
T04sanss11u:26: svabhāvabhinnā prakṛtīya bālāḥ kuto 'sti mitraṃ hi pṛthagjanānāṃ ||
T04sanss11u:27: sahadhārmikeno vacanenôktāḥ krodhaṃ ca doṣaṃ câpratyayaṃ ca |
T04sanss11u:28: prāviṣkarontîmi bāladharmêmam artha vijñāya na viśvasanti ||
T04sanss11u:29: bālā hi bālehi samaṃ samenti yathâmedhyenâmedhya sārddham |
T04sanss11u:30: vijñaḥ punar vijñajanena sārddhaṃ samenti sarpir yatha sarpimaṇḍe ||
T04sanss11u:32: sūsukhitāḥ sada te naraloke yeṣu priyâpriya nâsti kahiṃcit |
T04sanss11u:33: ye ca na kandarake 'bhiramante śrāmaṇakaṃ susukhaṃ anubhonti ||
T04sanss11u:36: khaḍgasamā vicaranti mu lokaṃ gagane pavana yathêva vrajanti ||
T04sanss11u:38: syuḥ sukhitā vata te naraloke yeṣu na sajjati mānasa loke |
T04sanss11u:39: vāyusamaṃ sada teṣv iha cittaṃ nô ca priyâpriya vidyati saṃgo ||
T04sanss11u:40: apriya ye dukhitehi nivāso ye 'pi priyā dukhitehi viyogo |
T04sanss11u:41: antôbhe 'pi tehi jahitvā te sukhitā naraye rata dharme ||
T04sanss11u:43: bhavati satatam alpakṛtyayogī pṛthu guṇa doṣata sarvi varjayitvā |
T04sanss11u:46: kadāci yuktayogîmi guṇa tasya bhavanty araṇyavāse ||
T04sanss11u:47: sada bhavati niviṇṇa saṃskṛte 'sau na bhavati tasya pṛhā kahiṃci loke |
T04sanss11u:48: na ca bhavati vivṛddhir āsravāṇāṃ vanavasato 'sya bhavanti ānuśaṃsāḥ ||
T04sanss11u:49: adhikaraṇa na tasya jātu bhotī sadôpaśāntarato vivekacārī |
T04sanss11u:50: vacaci manasi kāya saṃvṛtasyo bahuguṇa tasya bhavanty araṇyavāse ||
T04sanss11u:51: bhavati anukūla tasya mokṣo laghu pratividhyati so 'dhimukti śāntām |
T04sanss11u:52: vanicari dhimukti sevate 'syêmi guṇa bhonty araṇyavāsi sarve ||
T04sanss11u:54: vanaṣaṇḍa sevatha vivikta sadā vijahitva grāmanagareṣu ratim |
T04sanss11u:55: advitīyakhaḍgasama bhotha sadā na cireṇa lapsyatha samādhivaram |
T04sanss11u:60: te 'raṇye ratim āpnuvanti guṇinaḥ śāntêndriyāḥ sūratāḥ ||
T04sanss11u:61: na strīsaṃbhava nâiva câpi puruṣais teṣāṃ kvacid vidyate |
T04sanss11u:63: lābhair nâpi ca teṣu harṣa svamano līyanty alābhair na ca |
T04sanss11u:67: satvasaṃsargo me na kartavyo na hi mayâikasatvasya kuśalamūlāni saṃjanayitavyānîty ādi
T04sanss11u:68: yadi punaḥ śrutavān imāṃ kṣaṇasaṃpadam āsādya lābhâdau saktaḥ cittaṃ na śodhayet sâivâikaḥ
T04sanss11u:71: tad yathā kāśyapa kaścid eva puruṣo mahatôdakârṇavenôhyamānôdakatṛṣṇayā
T04sanss11u:73: evam eva kāśyapêhâike śramaṇabrāhmaṇā bahūn dharmān udgṛhya paryavāpya na rāgatṛṣṇāṃ vinodayanti
T04sanss11u:80: yeṣu ca sthāneṣu nâtidūre piṇḍapātagocaro bhavati na
T04sanss11u:83: yeṣu pānīyāni bhavanty acchāni śucīni nirmalāny alpâyāsāni mukhaparibhogāni yā-
T04sanss11u:85: ni ca sthānāni vṛkṣasaṃpannāni bhavanti puṣpasaṃpannāni phalasaṃpannāni pattrasaṃpannāny apagataduṣṭaśvāpadāni guhāsaṃpannāni prāgbhārasaṃpannāni sukhaparisarpyakāṇi śāntāny advitīyāni tādṛśāni sthānāny āśrayet |
T04sanss11u:86: sa teṣu sthāneṣv āśrito yad anena pūrvapaṭhitaṃ bhavati tat tribhī rātrais trirdivasasya svâdhyāyati nâtyuccena svareṇa nâtinīcena nôddhatair
T04sanss11u:87: indriyair na bahirgatena cittena prasādam upajīvan grantham upadhārayan nimittāny udgṛhṇan middham apakrāman |
T04sanss11u:88: saced āraṇyakasya bhikṣo rājā vôpasaṃkrāmati rājamātro vânye vā
T04sanss11u:96: tasya te mahārāja lābhāḥ sulabdhā yasya te bhūpradeśe śīlavanto guṇavanto bahuśrutāḥ śramaṇabrāhmaṇāḥ prativasanti |
T04sanss11u:98: sacet sthiro bhavati vinītaḥ praśāntêndriyaḥ bhavyaś ca bhavati dharmadeśanāyāḥ tato 'sya vicitrā dharmadeśanôpasaṃhartavyā |
T04sanss11u:101: sacet saṃvegânukūlāṃ na priyāyate udārôdārāṇi tathāgatamāhātmyāni upadeṣṭavyāni |
T04sanss11u:104: sâivaṃ bahuśrutaḥ san pratibalo bhavati dhārmaśravaṇikānāṃ cittam ārādhayituṃ |
T04sanss11u:105: te ca satvās tasyântike prītiṃ ca prasādaṃ ca prāmodyaṃ ca pratilabhantae iti ||
T04sanss11u:108: punar aparaṃ gṛhapate pravrajitena bodhisatvenâraṇye prativasatâivam upaparīkṣitavyaṃ |
T04sanss11u:117: api tu khalu punar ahaṃ yasyârthāyâraṇye prativasāmi sa mayârthaḥ paripūrayitavyo yad uta śrāmaṇyârthaḥ ||
T04sanss11u:119: punar aparaṃ gṛhapate pravrajitena bodhisatvenâraṇye viharatâivam upaparīkṣitavyaṃ |
T04sanss11u:132: anitye nityêti viparyāsabhayabhīto 'nātmany ātmêti viparyāsabhayabhīto 'śucau śucir iti viparyāsabhayabhīto |
T04sanss11u:138: 'śrute śrutam iti bhayabhīto 'mate matam iti bhayabhīto 'vijñāte vijñātam iti bhayabhīto 'śramaṇe śramaṇamadabhayabhīto 'nyonyavidveṣaṇabhayabhītaḥ
T04sanss11u:140: manasikārebhyo bhayabhī tâibhyo hy aham evaṃrūpebhyo bhayabhairavebhyo bhīto 'raṇyâvāsam upagataḥ
T04sanss11u:142: punar aparaṃ gṛhapate pravrajitena bodhisatvenâraṇyavāsasthitena bhītena vā trastena vâivaṃ śikṣitavyaṃ |
T04sanss11u:143: yāni kānicid bhayāny utpadyante sarvāṇi tāny ātmagrāhatôtpadyante ||
T04sanss11u:145: sacet punar aham araṇye prativasan nâtmagrāhaṃ parityajeyaṃ nâtmâbhiniveśaṃ nâtmaparigrahaṃ nâtmanidānaṃ nâtmatṛṣṇāṃ nâtmasaṃjñāṃ
T04sanss11u:150: api tu khalu punar gṛhapate nâsty ātmasaṃjñino 'raṇyavāso |
T04sanss11u:153: araṇyavāso nāma gṛhapate ucyate sarvadharmeṣv asaṃbhavavāsaḥ sarvadharmeṣv asaṃgavāsaḥ ||
T04sanss11u:155: tad yathā gṛhapate 'raṇye tṛṇagulmâuṣadhivanaspatayaḥ prativasanto na
T04sanss11u:156: bibhyati nôttrasyanti na saṃtrasyanti na saṃtrāsam āpadyante |
T04sanss11u:157: evam eva gṛhapate pravrajitena bodhisatvenâraṇye viharatā tṛṇagulmâuṣadhivanaspatikāṣṭhakuḍyavad ātmapratibhāsavat saṃjñā kāye utpādayitavyā |
T04sanss11u:160: ko 'sminn uttrasyati |tena bhayabhītena vā trastena vâivaṃ yoniśaḥ kāyôpaparīkṣitavyaḥ
T04sanss11u:161: nâsty atra kāye ātmā vā satvo vā jīvo vā poṣo vā pudgalo vā manujo vā mānavo vā |
T04sanss11u:170: punar aparaṃ gṛhapate pravrajitena bodhisatvena buddhânujñāto 'raṇyavāsêti
T04sanss11u:175: sacet punar gṛhapate pravrajito bodhisatvôddeśasvâdhyāyârthaṃ gaṇam avatarati |
T04sanss11u:180: tathāgato 'py arhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ sadevasya lokasya sa-
T04sanss11u:182: mārakasya sabrahmakasya saśramaṇabrāhmaṇikāyāḥ prajāyāḥ pūjito dakṣiṇīyaḥ sarvasatvānāṃ |
T04sanss11u:183: so 'pi tāvan na kasyacit sakāśād upasthānaṃ svīkaroti |
T04sanss11u:187: api tu vayam eva sarvasatvānām upasthāyakā bhaviṣyāmaḥ |
T04sanss11u:188: vayam eva pareṣām upasthānaparicaryāṃ kariṣyāmo na ca punaḥ kasyacit sakāśād upasthānaparicaryāṃ svīkariṣyāmaḥ |
T04sanss11u:190: upasthānagurukasya hi gṛhapate bhikṣor guṇadharmânugraho naśyati |
T04sanss11u:191: yeṣāṃ ca saṃgrahaṃ karoti teṣām evaṃ bhavati |
T04sanss11u:194: sacet punar gṛhapate āraṇyako bodhisatvo dharmaśravaṇârthikâcāryôpādhyāyadarśanârthiko vā glānaparipṛcchako vā
T04sanss11u:195: grāmântikaṃ śayanâsanam āgacchet tena sâyam āgamanāya prakramaṇāya ca cittam utpādayitavyaṃ
T04sanss11u:196: sacet punar asya parapratibaddhôddeśaḥ svâdhyāyo vā tena vihāre prativasatâraṇyapravaṇacittena bhavitavyaṃ |
T04sanss11u:197: eṣâiva tasyâraṇyavāso yat sarvavastuṣv araṇyasaṃjñā dharmaparyeṣṭyā câtṛptêti ||
T04sanss11u:201: tena tatra na bhayaṃ na trāsôtpādayitavyaḥ |
T04sanss11u:206: api tu maitrīm utpādayitvā doṣaṃ vivarjayiṣyāmi bhayam apanayiṣyāmi |
T04sanss11u:207: yady evam api kṛtvā te vyāḍamṛgā māṃ jīvitād vyaparopya bhuñjīran |
T04sanss11u:209: lābhā me sulabdhā yasya me 'sārāt kāyāt sāram ādattaṃ bhaviṣyati |
T04sanss11u:210: na punar ime vyāḍamṛgāḥ śakyā mayâmiṣeṇa toṣayituṃ mama māṃsaṃ bhakṣayitvā sukhasparśaṃ vihariṣyanti
T04sanss11u:211: pe ||yadi punas tatrâraṇyâyatane viharato 'manuṣyôpasaṃkramiṣyanti suvarṇā vā durvarṇā vā
T04sanss11u:216: tatra tenâraṇyakena bhikṣuṇā yathāśakti yathābalaṃ yathādharmâdhigamāya tāsāṃ devatānāṃ-
T04sanss11u:219: yadi punas tāvaṅ gambhīrān praśnān paripṛccheyur yān sâraṇyako bhikṣur na śaknuyād visarjayituṃ
T04sanss11u:220: tena nirmānena bhūtvā vāg bhāṣitavyâśikṣito na paribhavitavyaḥ |
T04sanss11u:222: bhaviṣyati sa kālaḥ sa samayo yadâdhigatān dharmān śrutvā sarvakathāṃ visarjayiṣyāmi |
T04sanss11u:228: yathâiṣāṃ bhāvanām asvāmikānām amamānām aparigrahāṇām evaṃ niśceṣṭānāṃ nirvyāpārāṇāṃ bhavaty utpādo bhaṅgaś ca |
T04sanss11u:234: na punar atra kaścid dharmaḥ paramârthata*utpadyate vā nirudhyate vêti ||
T04sanss11u:238: na me kaścit sahāyo yo māṃ sukṛtaṃ duṣkṛtaṃ vā codayet |
T04sanss11u:239: api tu khalu punaḥ santîme devanāgayakṣā buddhāś ca bhagavanto ye mama
T04sanss11u:242: so 'ham ihâraṇyâyatane prativasann akuśalacittasya vaśaṃ gacchāmi |
T04sanss11u:245: vyāpaādaṃ vihinsāvitarkaṃ vā vitarkayeyam anyaṃ vâkuśalavitarkaṃ vitarkayeyaṃ |
T04sanss11u:247: te ca me devanāgayakṣā visaṃvāditāḥ buddhāś ca bhagavanto 'nabhirāddhā
